I'm a data-driven storyteller. I counsel NGOs, non-profits and businesses on researching and producing data-driven stories. I give talks, trainings and workshops on data-driven storytelling techniques and best practices. I'm available to carry out academic and journalistic research. Thanks to a fund from Google’s Digital News Initiative, I’m in the process of founding my own company, producing research and solutions at the intersection of data, journalism and digital fabrication. I was lead data journalist and trainer at Silk.co, a semantic web platform for publishing and visualizing data. Before, I've crafted data journalism stories and data visualizations for digital and print Italian news outlets. I privilege the use of open source tools and/or of coding. I have a background in History and a MA specializing in data journalism. I'm Italian, currently based in Venice (Italy).
